BALI ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR

BALI ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR IS EXPERIENCE FOR RIDING AN ELEPHANT AT BAKAS VILLAGE, ELEPHANT CAMP, MASON IN TARO VILLAGE, BALI ZOO OR BALI SAFARI

Bali Elephant Ride Tour is Bali Activities Tour package by give you the opportunity to riding an elephant into the jungle, village and rice terrace in Bali. Bali Elephant Ride Tour is the most favorite Bali Tour adventure in Bali,  just imagine yourself like a king riding an elephant on a teak chair swaying back and forth with the movement of this greatest mammals!. Bali offers not just various customs but also various adventures parks. Many exciting amusements are available in Bali, with something new opening all time. The number of offshore and inland attraction are on the rise because many tourists want them. You and your elephant become a part of the real Balinese experience.

Bali Elephant Ride is part of our effort to conserve this magnificent species from Sumatra. We want you to learn more about them. Get the experience of living with go trekking with our incredible elephants. By riding our elephants you help us and help other elephants in Sumatra by providing funds for food and land to make sure their homes remain protected. The best part of the Elephant Back Safari is the exclusive and educational insight from our highly qualified and interpretive elephant handlers. Our elephant herd is cared for by a special group of men, who treat the elephants like one of their own. Like humans, each elephants develop their own unique personalities throughout their long lives. Seated comfortably on the back of these gentle giants, the elephant ride offers guests a chance to learn about natureâ€™s true "king of the beasts" through understanding their natural behavior, intelligence, habitat and conservation. These largest of land mammals are keystone species on whose conservation the existence of many other aspects of biodiversity depends.

When it comes to very unusual tours, it's definitely an elephant ride, with a thrill that's sure to make you feel like an ancient king, riding an elephant for a ride. Here we make you the King and Queen in this elephant ride, with a duration that you can choose between 15 minutes and 30 minutes. Elephant ride tours are definitely very satisfying and give more meaning to your life. As you know, the elephant is the biggest animal and the smartest animal and also a very cute animal. Here we provide an opportunity for those of you who want to know more about this truly amazing animal. Get to know more closely and interact with elephants and also capture your moment with elephants, is an experience that will make history in your life journey, enjoy riding elephants with your partner or family

Bali Elephant Ride Tour It's once in a lifetime experience you'll always remember as you enjoy the superb sceneries : its secret pathways, its lovely sights and its dense forest plants where live song birds, gibbons, and local monkeys in their own habitat. All our services are with international standard safety, equipments and guides applied. Covered also with insurance. is an experience you'll never forget.
